name: 怒海 Rough Sea
description:
A world is infinitely possible

In a voyage, you are stranded on a desert island due to pirate attacks. You need to build your own foothold on the island and collect materials to build ships to sail. Whether you become a freight merchant, trade materials to establish your base, or become the dominant party of pirates, you will become a maritime legend in the adventure of this world

Free creation

You can collect materials and build your own houses and plant various crops in the game.。

Sailing and fighting

You can build your own ships to fight against enemy ships in the vast ocean. You can explore unknown islands and various enemies and collect spoils.。
